alreadyConnected.description: This domain is already verified and ready to send emails.

verification.readyToSend: Your domain is ready to send emails. You can now create sender accounts.

sequenceProgress.description: Are you sure you want to move to the next step? Make sure you've saved your sequence changes.

loading.title: Loading Sender Accounts
loading.description: Please wait while we fetch your domain accounts...

noVerifiedDomains.title: No Verified Domains

header.title: Sender Accounts
header.description: Select which accounts will send emails for this campaign

noSenderAccounts.title: No Sender Accounts
noSenderAccounts.description: Add sender accounts to this domain to use them in campaigns

testModal.note: Sends your first campaign email with test variables (John Doe, Acme Corp)

errors.pleaseEnterEmail: Please enter an email address to send the test to.
errors.noSenderSelected: No sender selected for test email.
errors.failedToSendTestTryAgain: Failed to send test email. Please try again.
errors.failedToLoadDomains: Failed to load domain accounts. Please try again.

success.testEmailSent: Test email sent from {{senderEmail}} to {{testEmail}}. Reply to test the complete flow!

domainSetup.description: Enter your domain to start sending emails

validation.invalidDomain: Please enter a valid domain (e.g., example.com)

manual.description: We'll guide you through setting up your domain manually

steps.title: What happens next:
steps.getInstructions: You'll get step-by-step DNS setup instructions
steps.copyRecords: Copy the DNS records to your domain provider

login.title: Login to {{provider}}
login.description: Login to automatically configure your domain

errors.authFailed: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.

dnsSetup.title: Setup {{domain}}
dnsSetup.subtitle: Follow these steps to connect your domain

quickSteps.title: Quick Steps
quickSteps.step1: Go to your domain provider (GoDaddy, Namecheap, etc.)
quickSteps.step3: Copy and paste each setting below
quickSteps.step4: Save and come back to verify

verification.addedSettings: I've added all the settings above to my domain provider
verification.timeNote: Changes can take up to 24 hours to take effect

emailSenders.title: Email Senders
emailSenders.description: Manage who can send emails from this domain
emailSenders.presetAccountsInfo: We've created 3 common email accounts for you. You can add more or customize these as needed.

noSenders.title: No senders yet
noSenders.description: Add email addresses that can send from this domain. Each sender gets their own email identity.

addDialog.description: Create a new email sender for {{domain}}
addDialog.displayDescription: How this sender will appear in recipient emails
addDialog.primaryNote: This will be your primary sender since it's the first one.

editDialog.title: Edit Sender
editDialog.description: Update the details for this email sender
editDialog.displayDescription: How this sender will appear in recipient emails
editDialog.dailyLimitDescription: Maximum number of emails this sender can send per day

deleteDialog.title: Remove Sender
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove this email sender? This action cannot be undone.
